from pyspark.sql.functions import col, when, coalesce, lit, current_timestamp
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

# Define paths
storage_account_name = "synapsestr"
delta_container_name = "nervecentre-delta"
source_delta_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_Diagnosis_xTab_vw'
target_delta_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_Diagnosis_xTab'

# Read source view
src_df = spark.read.format("delta").load(source_delta_path)

# Create a DeltaTable object for the target table
target_table = DeltaTable.forPath(spark, target_delta_path)

# Define merge condition
merge_condition = "tgt.visitarchiveid = src.visitarchiveid"

# Define update condition (this is a simplified version, expand for all columns)
update_condition = """
    (COALESCE(src.EC_Diagnosis_Code1SNOMED, 'X') <> COALESCE(tgt.EC_Diagnosis_Code1SNOMED, 'X')) OR
    (COALESCE(src.EC_Diagnosis_Qualifier1SNOMED, 'X') <> COALESCE(tgt.EC_Diagnosis_Qualifier1SNOMED, 'X')) OR
    (COALESCE(src.EC_Diagnosis_Latarality1SNOMED, 'X') <> COALESCE(tgt.EC_Diagnosis_Latarality1SNOMED, 'X'))
    -- Add similar conditions for columns 2-10
"""

# Define the columns to update (this is a simplified version, expand for all columns)
update_columns = {
    "Diagnosiosis1Desc": "src.Diagnosiosis1Desc",
    "EC_Diagnosis_Code1SNOMED": "src.EC_Diagnosis_Code1SNOMED",
    "DiagnosisQualifier1Desc": "src.DiagnosisQualifier1Desc",
    "EC_Diagnosis_Qualifier1SNOMED": "src.EC_Diagnosis_Qualifier1SNOMED",
    "DiagnosisLatarality1Desc": "src.DiagnosisLatarality1Desc",
    "EC_Diagnosis_Latarality1SNOMED": "src.EC_Diagnosis_Latarality1SNOMED",
    # Add similar entries for columns 2-10
}

# Perform the MERGE operation
(target_table.alias("tgt")
 .merge(
    src_df.alias("src"),
    merge_condition
 )
 .whenMatchedUpdate(
    condition=update_condition,
    set=update_columns
 )
 .whenNotMatchedInsert(
    values=update_columns
 )
 .whenNotMatchedBySource()
 .delete()
 .execute())

# Log the number of affected rows (optional)
affected_rows = target_table.toDF().count()
print(f"Number of rows in the target table after merge: {affected_rows}")

# Version 2

Earlier version of Delta Lake

from pyspark.sql.functions import col, when, coalesce, lit, current_timestamp
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

# Define paths
storage_account_name = "synapsestr"
delta_container_name = "nervecentre-delta"
source_delta_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_Diagnosis_xTab_vw'
target_delta_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_Diagnosis_xTab'

# Read source view
src_df = spark.read.format("delta").load(source_delta_path)

# Create a DeltaTable object for the target table
target_table = DeltaTable.forPath(spark, target_delta_path)

# Define merge condition
merge_condition = "tgt.visitarchiveid = src.visitarchiveid"

# Define update condition (expand this for all columns 1-10)
update_condition = """
    (COALESCE(src.EC_Diagnosis_Code1SNOMED, 'X') <> COALESCE(tgt.EC_Diagnosis_Code1SNOMED, 'X')) OR
    (COALESCE(src.EC_Diagnosis_Qualifier1SNOMED, 'X') <> COALESCE(tgt.EC_Diagnosis_Qualifier1SNOMED, 'X')) OR
    (COALESCE(src.EC_Diagnosis_Latarality1SNOMED, 'X') <> COALESCE(tgt.EC_Diagnosis_Latarality1SNOMED, 'X'))
    -- Add similar conditions for columns 2-10
"""

# Define the columns to update (expand this for all columns 1-10)
update_columns = {
    "Diagnosiosis1Desc": "src.Diagnosiosis1Desc",
    "EC_Diagnosis_Code1SNOMED": "src.EC_Diagnosis_Code1SNOMED",
    "DiagnosisQualifier1Desc": "src.DiagnosisQualifier1Desc",
    "EC_Diagnosis_Qualifier1SNOMED": "src.EC_Diagnosis_Qualifier1SNOMED",
    "DiagnosisLatarality1Desc": "src.DiagnosisLatarality1Desc",
    "EC_Diagnosis_Latarality1SNOMED": "src.EC_Diagnosis_Latarality1SNOMED",
    # Add similar entries for columns 2-10
}

# Perform the MERGE operation
(target_table.alias("tgt")
 .merge(
    src_df.alias("src"),
    merge_condition
 )
 .whenMatchedUpdate(
    condition=update_condition,
    set=update_columns
 )
 .whenNotMatchedInsert(
    values=update_columns
 )
 .execute())

# Perform the delete operation for records not in source
target_df = target_table.toDF()
records_to_delete = target_df.join(src_df, ['visitarchiveid'], 'left_anti')

if records_to_delete.count() > 0:
    target_table.delete(
        condition = "visitarchiveid IN (SELECT visitarchiveid FROM records_to_delete)"
    )

# Log the number of affected rows (optional)
affected_rows = target_table.toDF().count()
print(f"Number of rows in the target table after merge and delete: {affected_rows}")
